text: Walter Moers (born 24 May 1957 in Mönchengladbach, Germany) is one of the best-known and most commercially successful German comic book creators and authors. ==Works available in English translation== *Little asshole, 1991 (English Edn) *The 13½ Lives of Captain Bluebear, 2000 (UK) / 2005 (US) *A Wild Ride Through the Night, 2004 *Rumo and His Miraculous Adventures, 2004 *The City of Dreaming Books, 2006. *The Alchemaster’s Apprentice, 2009 (English Edn). 978-1-846-55222-9 *The Labyrinth of Dreaming Books, 2012 (English Edn) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official page Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Comics artists Category:German artists Category:People from Mönchengladbach Category:Writers from North Rhine- Westphalia
title: Walter Moers
